name: angst
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
strong worry and unhappiness, especially about personal problems: All my children went through a period of late-adolescent angst.

a feeling of extreme anxiety and unhappiness: The boy’s mysterious disappearance has caused angst and guilt for the family.
